dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description: Incredibly simple helpers for testing code with exceptions
dependencies.name: perl-test-fatal

dependencies.description: Checks to see if the module can be loaded.
dependencies.name: perl-test-requires

dependencies.description: Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@
dependencies.name: perl-try-tiny

dependent_to.description:
LCOV is a graphical front-end for GCC's coverage testing tool gcov. It
collects gcov data for multiple source files and creates HTML pages
containing the source code annotated with coverage information. It also
adds overview pages for easy navigation within the file structure. LCOV
supports statement, function and branch coverage measurement.
dependent_to.name: lcov

dependent_to.description: Execute code after a scope finished compilation.
dependent_to.name: perl-b-hooks-endofscope

dependent_to.description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util
dependent_to.name: perl-list-someutils

description: Loads one of several alternate underlying implementations for a module
name: perl-module-implementation

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
